price: ហើយជិន(អ៊ីព្លីស)យើងបានបង្កើតវាមុន(អាដាំ)អំពី ភ្លើងដែលក្ដៅបំផុត។
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
